insertAtPos

public void insertAtPos(int insertionPos,
                        double gradientPos,
                        ColorCafe gradientColor)
Inserts the gradient point at the specified position in the internal gradient-point array.

Parameters:
insertionPos - The zero-based array position in which to insert the gradient point.
gradientPos - The position of this gradient point.
gradientColor - The color of this gradient point. To make room for this new gradient point, this method reallocates the gradient-point array and shifts all gradient points occurring after the insertion position up by one. Because this object requires that all gradient points in the array must be sorted by the position, the new gradient point should be inserted at the position in which the order is still preserved.

getGradientPointArray

public GradientPoint[] getGradientPointArray()
Returns a pointer to the array of gradient points in this object.

Returns:
A pointer to the array of gradient points. Before calling this method, call getGradientPointCount() to determine the number of gradient points in this array. It is recommended that an application does not store this pointer for later use since the pointer to the array may change if the application calls another method of this object.

getGradientPointCount

public int getGradientPointCount()
Returns the number of gradient points stored in this object.

Returns:
The number of gradient points stored in this object.
